ConnectionStrings.Staging: Host={host}; Database={database}; Username={username}; Password={password}; Root Certificate={/.postgresql/root.crt.}; Sslmode=VerifyFull
ConnectionStrings.Production: Host={host}; Database={database}; Username={username}; Password={password}; Root Certificate={/.postgresql/root.crt.}; Sslmode=VerifyFull
